text: Iam more than conscious of this. How anybody can go through the same routine in and out for forty years I find difficult to understand_ A lot of it is inevitable so that industry and commerce may be kept going though if ever it becomes possible to work out a system of 'staggered' hours it may do an immense amount of over and above relieving the pressure on over-crowded trains.
